survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners about their satisfaction with current charging infrastructure, including accessibility, reliability, and ease of use.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify responses and enhance readability.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend public EV charging stations to other EV owners?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: Would you recommend public EV charging stations to other EV owners?
